position: KYC/AML Analyst at Tide | ACAMS in Progress | Expert in Financial Crime Investigations, Regulatory Compliance & Risk Management  | Driving Productivity, Client Onboarding & Process Improvements | Sujanian

experience.title: Anti-Money Laundering Analyst
experience.description: Conducted 250+ KYC/KYB reviews per month, ensuring strict adherence to POCA 2002 and EU AML Directives, minimizing regulatory risks and protecting the organization's reputation.Proactively identified and mitigated money laundering, fraud, smurfing, and terrorist financing risks through detailed CDD, EDD, and alert reviews, ensuring risk classification aligned with international compliance standards.Performed comprehensive customer verifications (CDD, EDD, TDD, and CEDD), including SOF/SOW validation, sanctions screening, PEP reviews, and adverse media checks using advanced tools such as RDC, LexisNexis, World-Check, Excelity, and Bloomberg.Analyzed and unraveled complex ownership structures, tracing UBOs through public registries and UK Company House to strengthen due diligence processes.Consistently achieved 100% quality ratings and exceeded productivity goals by 130%, contributing to streamlined workflows and operational efficiency.Played a key role in training and mentoring new hires, fostering a high-performing team through knowledge-sharing and hands-on guidance.Partnered closely with clients to address onboarding complexities, resolve escalations, and ensure a seamless compliance journey, enhancing client satisfaction and retention.
experience.description_html: Conducted 250+ KYC/KYB reviews per month, ensuring strict adherence to POCA 2002 and EU AML Directives, minimizing regulatory risks and protecting the organization's reputation.Proactively identified and mitigated money laundering, fraud, smurfing, and terrorist financing risks through detailed CDD, EDD, and alert reviews, ensuring risk classification aligned with international compliance standards.Performed comprehensive customer verifications (CDD, EDD, TDD, and CEDD), including SOF/SOW validation, sanctions screening, PEP reviews, and adverse media checks using advanced tools such as RDC, LexisNexis, World-Check, Excelity, and Bloomberg.Analyzed and unraveled complex ownership structures, tracing UBOs through public registries and UK Company House to strengthen due diligence processes.Consistently achieved 100% quality ratings and exceeded productivity goals by 130%, contributing to streamlined workflows and operational efficiency.Played a key role in training and mentoring new hires, fostering a high-performing team through knowledge-sharing and hands-on guidance.Partnered closely with clients to address onboarding complexities, resolve escalations, and ensure a seamless compliance journey, enhancing client satisfaction and retention.

experience.title: Fincrime Analyst
experience.description: Investigated 100+ financial crime cases weekly, including money laundering, smurfing, and fraud, addressing alerts related to "top-up limit exceed" and other triggers flagged by AML systems.Conducted in-depth transaction analysis to detect unusual patterns, ensuring timely escalation of high-risk cases via UARs and SARs submitted to the Financial Intelligence Unit (FIU).Utilized a wide range of AML tools and techniques to enhance fraud prevention strategies and optimize transaction monitoring frameworks.Delivered insights to cross-functional teams, contributing to product and compliance improvements aimed at mitigating systemic risks and improving user experience.
experience.description_html: Investigated 100+ financial crime cases weekly, including money laundering, smurfing, and fraud, addressing alerts related to "top-up limit exceed" and other triggers flagged by AML systems.Conducted in-depth transaction analysis to detect unusual patterns, ensuring timely escalation of high-risk cases via UARs and SARs submitted to the Financial Intelligence Unit (FIU).Utilized a wide range of AML tools and techniques to enhance fraud prevention strategies and optimize transaction monitoring frameworks.Delivered insights to cross-functional teams, contributing to product and compliance improvements aimed at mitigating systemic risks and improving user experience.

experience.title: AML Compliance Analyst
experience.description: Led end-to-end reviews of customer due diligence (CDD) files for a critical KYC remediation project, ensuring compliance with global regulatory standards and achieving a significant reduction in backlog.Analyzed transaction patterns using dashboards to identify unusual activity and escalate AML/TF risks, applying Enhanced Due Diligence (EDD) protocols when necessary.Collaborated with onshore teams in Glasgow to source client documentation and streamline onboarding processes, enhancing efficiency in KYC production.Successfully handled diverse entity types, including Private Limited and UK Limited by Guarantee, ensuring 100% compliance with RFT requirements and mitigating financial risks.
experience.description_html: Led end-to-end reviews of customer due diligence (CDD) files for a critical KYC remediation project, ensuring compliance with global regulatory standards and achieving a significant reduction in backlog.Analyzed transaction patterns using dashboards to identify unusual activity and escalate AML/TF risks, applying Enhanced Due Diligence (EDD) protocols when necessary.Collaborated with onshore teams in Glasgow to source client documentation and streamline onboarding processes, enhancing efficiency in KYC production.Successfully handled diverse entity types, including Private Limited and UK Limited by Guarantee, ensuring 100% compliance with RFT requirements and mitigating financial risks.

experience.title: Sales And Marketing Intern
experience.description: Partnered directly with co-founders to understand startup operations, contributing to strategic decision-making and business growth.Successfully onboarded 50+ high-value clients in a short timeframe, driving revenue growth and enhancing the client portfolio.Proposed and implemented innovative sales strategies, accelerating customer acquisition and improving market presence.Delivered personalized guidance to clients on using the customer interface, streamlining user experience and ensuring higher satisfaction rates.
